'''Simon Lowe''' is a British actor who has appeared as a regular in British TV shows ''[[wikipedia:Bodies (TV series)|Bodies]]'', ''[[wikipedia:The Grimleys|The Grimleys]]'' and ''[[wikipedia:EastEnders|EastEnders]]''. On stage he has played the role of [[wikipedia:Dudley Moore|Dudley Moore]] in the show ''Peter and Dud: Come Again''.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' he made a brief appearance as a [[wineseller]] who tries to poison â€‹[[Daenerys Targaryen]] in [[Vaes Dothrak]] and is killed by the [[Dothraki]], in the [[You Win or You Die|seventh episode]] of the [[Season 1|first season]].
